scripts.upgrade-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p upgrade || exit 1; done
scripts.clean-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p run clean || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p run build || exit 1; done
scripts.patch-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p version patch || exit 1; done
scripts.install-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do yarn --cwd papiea-$p || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all!: yarn run upgrade-all && yarn run build-all
